import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import courses from '../courses' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Form,Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' const CourseScreen = () => { // destructure , :courseCode is rename const {codeId:courseCode} =useParams(); //fetch course const course = courses.find((course)=>course.code===courseCode) return ( <> hello

{course.name}
